version_description:
- Bitcoin Cash new address format support (cashaddr)
- Bug fixes (Coinbase integration)
- Minor UI improvements

- New gift card integration: Mercado Livre (redeemable for Mercado Livre users in Brazil only)
- Bug fixes

- Bitcoin Cash new address format support (cashaddr)
- Bug fixes (Coinbase integration)
- Minor UI improvements
- QR Codes fixes in receive.
- Exchange between Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash in your wallet with our new in-app ShapeShift integration
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
- Payment Protocol Implementation fixes

* Bitcoin Cash Debit and Gift Card top-ups
* Improvements on Payment Protocol for multi signature transaction proposals
* Fixes SendMax for BCH
* Payment Protocol Bug Fixes
Bug fixes

* General improvements in performance and smoother animations
* Background task optimizations
* Turn on/off integration services individually
* Order your wallets in Home
* Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
* Fixes white screen issue when app starts on some devices

* Update translations
* Bug fixes

Improves flow to add a BitPay Card
Updates French translation

Bug fixes:

Updates home view after you sign/broadcast/remove a proposal
Avoids handling deep links if the app is already started
Shows cached history and balance if the app gets a connection error
Fixes custom wallet order
Bug fixes on Coinbase integration

- Update translations
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- UI bug fixes for small screen devices
- Updated translations
- Privacy Policy and email opt-in updates for compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union (EU)

- UI improvements on home, receive and settings screens
- Added an option to unlink the BitPay Account (and all cards associated)
- Added the possibility to archive your Mercado Livre Brazil gift cards
- BCH paper wallet sweeping
- Improvements in the transactions list
- Improved Fingerprint and PIN modals
- Added warning messages for Testnet wallet
- Minor bug fixes due to bitcoin URI with incomplete params and support "bchtest" prefix
- Fixes in Coinbase integration
- Fixes on the wallet import functionality from on-boarding screen

- New Amazon.co.jp Gift Cards are now available (only Japan)
- Improved performance (lower battery usage in background mode)
- Fixes wallet import from onboarding screen
- Translation updates
- General UI bug fixes

* New Tab navigations for Wallets
* New Feedback flow: send us your rating, comments or opinions regarding your experience with the app
* General UI improvements in the way to receive and send BTC or BCH
* Email receipts for Amazon Gift Card purchases (new email requirement)
* Detect a valid Bitcoin(Cash) URI or Payment Protocol Requests from clipboard
* Bug fixes on Coinbase and Amazon integrations
* Translation update

* Update translations
* Manual refresh on scrolling down at Wallet Details Page
* Bug fixes when updating wallet status for desktop and mobile when the app get on focus or resume
* Fix UI for long strings when use different languages
* Bug fixes on Amazon Japan integration
iOS 12 support

NEW
* Persistent logs: this could help us solve possible errors in your wallet and improve our support.
* Updates balance and history when app resume
* Supports iOS 12

IMPROVED
* Spanish and French translations
* More readable messages on confirm view
* Gift Cards: improved UX for Amazon.com and Mercado Libre integrations.

BUG FIXES
* Fixed UI for wallet in foreign languages
* Fixed wallet import when BWS returns an error
* Coinbase integration: allows only US bank accounts. Also fixes on the sell process
* Address book support for BCH testnet legacy addresses
* Fixed address book import/export
Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

NEW

* ETH Testnet support
* EUR Gift Cards
* Export Key to another wallet as QR code

BUG FIXES

* Clear badge of pending notification
* UI issues on Settings Page
* Send-max for top up cards

* Enhanced wallet creation flow
* Minor bug fixes

NEW

This major release includes improvements on performance and user experience. Also adds support for multiple wallets using the same "key".

IMPROVED

- Gift Cards enhancements (and activation fees)
- Update Translations
- Increases security with CSP
- Joining page improved
- BitPay Card main view improved

BUG FIXES

- Seed list for small devices
- Fix transaction history refresh when sending & receiving

* Support for ShapeShift Membership (verified account required)
* Minor bug fixes

NEW

BitPay app users can go places with gift cards for Uber, Delta, and more.
Now if you're feeling adventurous, you can take a car (Uber), a plane (Delta), and get a hotel (http://Hotels.com) with digital gift cards bought with Bitcoin from the app. Want a snack for the trip? Uber Eats has got you covered.

IMPROVED

In-app notifications are now available for this version. If you are in the app and get a transaction, you can see to which wallet has been sent and how many BTC/BCH.

BUG FIXES

* Cordova webview plugin security update.
* Adds a required parameter to get all addresses from big wallets due to some errors while scanning.
* A few UI bug fixes.

NEW

Now if you're feeling adventurous, you can take a car (Uber), a plane (Delta), and get a hotel (http://Hotels.com) with digital gift cards bought with Bitcoin from the app. Want a snack for the trip? Uber Eats has got you covered.

IMPROVED

In-app notifications are now available for this version. If you are in the app and get a transaction, you can see to which wallet has been sent and how many BTC/BCH.

BUG FIXES

* A few UI bug fixes.
Security patch
* Security update: network restrictions

NEW
* Added more gift cards: Home Depot, Royal Caribbean and Carnival Cruise Line!

IMPROVED
* Improves gift card integration. Update translations. Security improvements.

BUG FIXES
* UI issue on iPhone X (S, S Max and R)

Happy New Year, everyone!

This update features improvements on performance and user experience. Bug fixes in this version include:

* Fixes on the Transaction History for big wallets
* Fixed iOS translations that didn't work on some devices
* Updated UI icons
* Fixed BCH information on Transaction Details
* Fixed available balance shown while refreshing

New Gift Cards available to buy: Burger King, GameStop, Papa John’s, Pottery Barn, Sony PlayStation, Spotify, AMC Theatres, Nike, P.F. Chang's and more.

Also this update features improvements on performance and user experience. Bug fixes in this version include:

* Fixes on the Transaction History
* Fixed available balance shown while refreshing

* UI improvements: display your wallets at top of screen without scrolling
* More Gift Cards available to buy: Xbox, Guitar Center, and Cabela’s
* Updated translations (Spanish, French and Italian)

* UI improvements in Home view
* More Gift Cards available to buy: Xbox, Guitar Center, and Cabela's
* Updated Translations (Spanish, French and Italian)
* Fixed warning when deleting wallet data

This update features improvements on performance and user experience. This version includes:
* Multi-signature wallets: sets coin automatically from invitation code
* Improved events handler when receiving notifications
* Fixed fee rate units on transaction details
* Server-side gift card catalog management

This version includes:
– Sign multiple pending proposals feature
– Gift card bug fixes

* JSON Payment Protocol support
* Transaction's fee handling improvements
* Performance enhancements in Gift Cards views
* New design for Receive and Specific Amount views
* UI improvements for wallet creation and backup views
* Improves PIN feature performance
* Fixes in QR scanning
* Minor UI bug fixes

NEW
* Print your Gift Cards
* Simplify onboarding for new users

IMPROVES
* Faster balance and transaction history updates
* Receive screen is cleanest and easiest to scan the address
* Opening you Wallet is faster with this new version

BUG FIXES
* Minor bug fixes for buy/sell through Coinbase integration inside the app
* Synced time for BitPay invoices paying with BIP-70 standard
* Better handler of errors in the "Receive" view
* Linking ShapeShift account with the app has been fixed for iOS
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

IMPROVES

* UX for sending funds to multiple recipients
* Error messaging

BUG FIXES

* Converting BTC to BCH (or vice versa) via Shapeshift now works properly for small amounts.
* QR codes for payment requests now render correctly on all devices.
* When importing a wallet via the QR code scanner, the correct coin (BTC or BCH) is now pre-selected on the import screen.

* Enhanced User Interface
* Add fiat value on transaction history
* Bug fixes

* Enhanced user interface for external services and wallet list
* PIN lock timer fixes
* BIP45 wallet import fixes
* Other minor fixes

* Gift card enhancements
* Bug fixes

* Fix transaction history refresh with sending & receiving
* Small bug fixes
- Bug fixes

This major release includes improvements on performance and user experience. Also adds support for multiple wallets using the same "key".

IMPROVED

Bug fixes

IMPROVED

* Send funds to Native Segwit Addresses (Bech32)
* Update Translations

BUG FIXES

* Order contacts by name
* Join wallet using accounts
* Redirect correctly when scanning a shared wallet invitation

* Fixes UI issues in home page
* Fixes ShapeShift expiration time at confirming a transaction

Bug fixes

* Enhanced wallet creation flow

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Ethereum support is now live in the BitPay app! 

Create Ethereum wallets, save Ether, or spend Ether. You can use your BitPay app's Ether wallet to pay friends, shop with BitPay merchants online, or buy gift cards.

* Merchant directory integration
* Enhanced wallet creation flow
* Minor UI bug fixes

NEW

* ETH Testnet support
* EUR Gift Cards
* Export Key to another wallet as QR code

BUG FIXES

* Clear badge of pending notification
* UI issues on Settings Page
* Send-max for top up cards

- Adds support to Canadian Gift Card
- Bug Fixes
- Bug fixes

This major release adds support for ERC-20 stablecoin tokens, including USD Coin (USDC), Paxos Standard (PAX) and Gemini Dollar (GUSD). It also includes improvements in performance and user experience for BitPay's app and integrated services.

– ERC-20 support
– Support PHP and INR currency symbols for Gift Cards
– Export key to another wallet as QR code
– UI improvements on BitPay Card, ShapeShift and Coinbase.
– Fixes bug to allow wallet launch from ETH URI link
– Fix UI animation on transition between pages
Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

This release adds support for XRP, the decentralized native cryptocurrency of the Ripple. Also new is the integration with Simplex©, which simplifies purchasing of supported cryptocurrencies. This release also includes improvements in performance and user experience for BitPay's app and integrated services.

NEW

* XRP support
* New Simplex integration

IMPROVED

* Performance improvements upon gift card purchase
* Update Spanish and French translations

BUG FIXES

* Fixed scanner permission issue when not authorized (only mobile)
* Fixed language and email preferences for all wallets
* Fixed filter of crypto currencies into the list of alternative currencies
Bug fixes

This release adds support for XRP, the decentralized native cryptocurrency of the Ripple. Also new is the integration with Simplex©, which simplifies purchasing of supported cryptocurrencies. This release also includes improvements in performance and user experience for BitPay's app and integrated services.

NEW

* XRP support
* New Simplex integration

IMPROVED

* Performance improvements upon gift card purchase
* Update Spanish and French translations

BUG FIXES

* Fixed scanner permission issue when not authorized (only mobile)
* Fixed language and email preferences for all wallets
* Fixed filter of crypto currencies into the list of alternative currencies

* A New Look and Feel *

The home tab is where you can check your total wallet value, exchange rates, buy crypto, and see current offers at a glance.

* Introducing Tabs *

Core features have now been re-organized into four accessible tabs allowing you to manage and spend your crypto seamlessly and quickly.

* A New Look and Feel *

The home tab is where you can check your total wallet value, exchange rates, buy crypto, and see current offers at a glance.

* Introducing Tabs *

Core features have now been re-organized into four accessible tabs allowing you to manage and spend your crypto seamlessly and quickly.

* Adds option to buy PAX through Simplex
* Bug fixes

This is a minor release that includes awesome new features and small bug fixes

NEW

* Order your list of wallets by Key
* Clear encrypted password if you missed it
* Badge that notifies pending transaction proposals
* Join the waitlist and be the first to experience our new BitPay Card

BUG FIXES

* Fix UI for wallet components
* Fix paypro URI with backward-compatibility
* Prevent duplicate redeem calls (Gift Cards)
* Fix send-max to make top-up (BitPay Card)

This is a minor release that includes awesome new features and small bug fixes

NEW

* Speed up received Bitcoin transactions
* Shows legacy address for BCH wallets
* New integration with Coinbase. Added transfer functionality (deposit/withdrawal) between a Coinbase balance and a local wallet

BUG FIXES

* Fixed incorrect value on amount view while switching between different coins
* Fixed ordered wallets groups
* Fixed show balance overlapping in wallet details
* Fixed card top-up send max
Fix errors when deleting wallets and other minor UI issues
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
* Adds BUSD (Binance USD) Support
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

NEW

* Create Wallet Segwit
* Add fiat currencies to Simplex
* Price charts (BTC, BCH, ETH and XRP)

IMPROVEMENTS

* Switch to legacy QR code
* New "Connect to Coinbase" button into Settings
* Move ShapeShift from home to settings tab. Improves list styling and adds setting link to the main view

BUG FIXES

* Scanner: close camera after scan and better handle of incoming-data
* Extend swipe down to refresh
* No-bounce and improve presentation for all views
* Qr-code: removes annoying shake when creating new address
* Onboarding: disable bounce (slides)
* Import wallets for an existing key
* Background color fixed in wallet-details (Ion-alert)
* Wrong payment code for BUSD
* UI issues on multi-sig wallets
* BCH payment BitPay invoices

NEW

* Create Wallet Segwit
* Add fiat currencies to Simplex
* Price charts (BTC, BCH, ETH and XRP)

IMPROVEMENTS

* Switch to legacy QR code
* New "Connect to Coinbase" button into Settings
* Move ShapeShift from home to settings tab. Improves list styling and adds setting link to the main view

BUG FIXES

* Scanner: close camera after scan and better handle of incoming-data
* Extend swipe down to refresh
* No-bounce and improve presentation for all views
* Qr-code: removes annoying shake when creating new address
* Onboarding: disable bounce (slides)
* Import wallets for an existing key
* Background color fixed in wallet-details (Ion-alert)
* Wrong payment code for BUSD
* UI issues on multi-sig wallets
* BCH payment BitPay invoices
Bug fixes

* Added new Mastercard for USA
* Bug fixes

* NEW: Shop Page (gift cards)
* Fixes Total Balance refreshing issues
* Fixes sending XRP through Coinbase integration
* Small UI bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Relax your eyes with Dark Mode. If your system theme has dark-mode enabled, your app will be in dark-mode too. If it's not, no problem, tap the gear icon at the bottom, tap Theme and then select Dark Mode.  That's it.

* Schnorr signatures support in Bitcoin Cash (livenet)
* Ethereum multisig support (Kovan testnet only)
* Bug fixes and updated translations
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

* Buy Crypto using Wyre!
* New scan button in bottom bar
* Enhanced buy Cryto experience
* Bug fixes in ETH multisig
Bug fixes
* Bug fixes

New version has released!

We're constantly working to improve your wallet experience, here’s a summary of what has changed:

What’s New

* New onboarding for new users: learn how BitPay App works and follow simple steps to get started in the crypto world
* Support creation Ethereum multi-signature wallet
* Scan to Pair a BitPay Card

Bug fixes
* Fixed topup BitPay Card using ERC tokens
* Fixed balance on refresh for Coinbase accounts
* Fixed some case when the app doesn’t show all Coinbase accounts
* Fixed ERC20 & ETH payment protocol when linked wallet has no funds
* Fixed UI on dark mode when open keyboard on mobile
* Fix error when verifying wallet backups
* Improves app performance and startup time
Bug fixes
Bug fixes on app startup
Bug fixes on app startup

This major release includes many awesome features and important improvements in performance and user experience.

* Trading and Exchange directly from your wallets *

Now you can quickly and safely exchange funds from one crypto wallet to another.

* DAI and WBTC added *

Store, Send, and Receive some of the top crypto assets used in Decentralized Finance (DeFi). DAI is a USD pegged stable coin and WBTC is an ERC20 token pegged to Bitcoin.

* Interact with DeFi and other DApps*

Try it out by selecting WalletConnect from settings, then scanning a DApp or DeFi QR code.
Bug fixes

* Fix stability issues on Bitpay Card views
* Better handling of Segwit payments
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

* Apple Pay support
* New "Send Max" for exchange crypto
* Gift Cards: better claim code fetch error messages
* Buy Crypto: minor bug fixes

* Doge coin support
* Updated translations
* Performance enhancements

* Bug fixes
* Update translations
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Improvements:

* New “Transact” button
* UX improvements to BitPay ID
* Customizable gasPrice and gasLimit
* Updated translations
* Updated informational/error messaging
* Fee level refactor
* UI improvements to select inputs
* Support DOGE multisig

Bug Fixes:

* Exporting of encrypted wallet
* SendMax for DOGE
* Min relay fee not met
* GiftCards: error that occurs during gift card purchases if an encrypt * password is entered incorrectly
* Dark mode adjustments
* Exchange rate graph causing app crashes
* Gas price supplied is lower than requested
* Gas estimations sometimes have very low GWEI
* Broadcast timeout behavior
Bug fixes

* Added new method to change network fee policy
* Improved BitPay Card referral events and advertisement
* Fixed error adding contacts to Address Book
* Fixed Sharing BitPay through social networks when fingerprint is enable.
* Fixed WalletConnect interaction

* Adds Litecoin (LTC) support
* Adds option to sync wallets between devices using same Key
* Adds new fee levels for ETH
* Improves In-App Notifications
* Updates translations
* Minor bug fixes

* Adds Litecoin (LTC) support
